about_the_game:
This is a Steam title version of a hit story released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc.

Being put up for bid at a black-market auction leads to the world's worst first impression - with the richest, most notorious bad boys around. Indulge in this collection of love stories full of luxury, danger, and spice.

An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.

"I bought you."
The worst first impression.

The Story
Working at Japan’s first hotel & casino, you stumble upon a black-market auction, and end up as one of the items for sale. “I’ll let you decide who buys you.” Five men place the winning bid, and now you’re completely at their mercy…

Character
Eisuke Ichinomiya "The Cold-Hearted CEO"
Soryu Oh "The cool Mobster"
Mitsunari Baba "The Womanizing Thief"
Ota Kisaki "The Enigmatic Artist"
Mamoru Kishi "The Slacker Detective"

Contents
Collection of Main Stories spanning the series up until the Proposal Epilogue for Eisuke Ichinomiya, Soryu Oh, Mitsunari Baba, Ota Kisaki, and Mamoru Kishi.

content_descriptors.notes: Some stories may contain scenes of a sexual nature not suitable for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
